main event: A UFO sighting was reported by Major MC near Lowry AFB, Colorado on 20 March 1954.
interesting points: The object had a slight blinking red center that lit up periodically and then trailed off until it was out of sight., The estimated distance to the object was 10 to 15 miles., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., An official Navy report concluded that the object was identified as a high altitude balloon., The report included observations of an object described as saucer-shaped with a slight hump on top.
sighted object: saucer-shaped object with a slight blinking red center
